name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or improvement for YaqatW
title: "[FEATURE] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''

---

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? Or what limitation does it address?

## Proposed Solution
How should this feature work? Describe the ideal workflow.

## Use Case
How would you use this feature in your research workflow?

Example:
> I'm analyzing interview transcripts and I want to [goal] so that [benefit].

## Alternative Approaches
Have you considered other solutions? What are the pros/cons?

## Additional Context
- Is this blocking your work?
- Are there similar features in other tools you use?
- Any mockups, sketches, or examples?
